about_the_game:
Game Introduction

  • Hallways is an exhilarating escape and pursuit game that challenges you and your friends to navigate treacherous corridors while evading relentless pursuers.

Game Modes

  • Solo Play: Test your skills and survival instincts by going solo in the game, where you must outwit and outrun the relentless pursuers.
  • Two-Player Mode: Collaborate with a friend as a dynamic duo, working together to outmaneuver the lurking threats and prove yourselves as the ultimate team.
  • Four-Player Mode: Assemble a team of four players and embark on an adrenaline-pumping adventure to find the quickest escape route while dodging the relentless pursuers.

Matchmaking System

  • Pit your skills against other players in the exhilarating matchmaking system, comparing your escape prowess with others and striving for the top ranks on the leaderboard.

Private Game Lobbies

  • Create private game lobbies to challenge your friends and set your own rules. Customize the game style and difficulty level to create a unique and thrilling experience to share with your friends.

Game Features

  • Stunning 3D graphics and dynamic corridor designs that keep you on the edge of your seat.
  • A diverse range of characters to choose from, each with their unique abilities and customization options.
  • Equip your characters with special powers and gear to aid in your escape from the relentless pursuers.
  • Strategic gameplay and challenging levels that require tactical thinking and teamwork.
  • Engage in online competition with both computer-controlled pursuers and other players through the matchmaking system.
  • A leaderboard system that showcases the top players and allows you to track your progress.
  • The ability to organize private games with friends and set your own custom rules.
  • Embark on an adrenaline-fueled adventure in Korridorun Pursuit, where quick thinking and strategy are your best allies in navigating perilous corridors and evading relentless pursuers. Whether you're competing with friends or challenging players from around the world, aim to become the ultimate escape artist and top the leaderboard. Get ready to run, strategize, and conquer the most treacherous corridors!

Game Introduction

  • Hallways is an exhilarating escape and pursuit game that challenges you and your friends to navigate treacherous corridors while evading relentless pursuers.

Game Modes

  • Solo Play: Test your skills and survival instincts by going solo in the game, where you must outwit and outrun the relentless pursuers.
  • Two-Player Mode: Collaborate with a friend as a dynamic duo, working together to outmaneuver the lurking threats and prove yourselves as the ultimate team.

Matchmaking System

Private Game Lobbies

Whether you're competing with friends or challenging players from around the world, aim to become the ultimate escape artist and top the leaderboard. name: The Hallways

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 3.0 GHz, AMD FX-8300 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Core i5-3330 3.0 GHz, AMD FX-8300 3.3 GHz
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Check Pc`s mode. Highly recommended from Emre Baş
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5 GHz, AMD Ryzen 3 1300X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Check Pc`s mode. Highly recommended from Emre Baş

Çevrimiçi etkileşim
Oyun içi sohbet

short_description: Introducing "Hallways," a multiplayer escape game. Navigate corridors, evade pursuers, and compete with friends or globally. Solo, 2-player, and 4-player modes, with a matchmaking system and private lobbies. Customize characters and gear, employ strategy, and conquer challenging levels in this game.
